(Statements
  (Package
    (Identifier))
  (Function
    (Empty)
    (Identifier)
    (Statements)
    (Statements
    {+(Assignment
      {+(Identifier)+}
      {+(Identifier)+})+}
    {+(Assignment
      {+(Identifier)+}
      {+(Statements)+})+}
      (Assignment
      { (Identifier)
      ->(Identifier) }
      { (Identifier)
      ->(Statements) })
    {-(Assignment
      {-(Identifier)-}
      {-(Statements)-})-}
    {-(Assignment
      {-(Identifier)-}
      {-(Statements)-})-})))
